item.title: 全能桌面助手：Cherry Studio
item.author: xyz.liu15@gmail.com (刘十五)
item.description: Cherry Studio is an all-in-one desktop assistant that solves choice paralysis, efficiency bottlenecks, and privacy concerns in the AI era by providing one-stop management of multiple AI models, 300+ professional assistants, and knowledge base functionality, enabling users to truly utilize AI efficiently without being overwhelmed by it.
